dmca.title: NOT A CEASE AND DESIST
dmca.body: Becasue your corporation had been administrarily disolved on the 17th day of Februay 2005, the name Hearthstone Mortggae inc. became available, abd was reserved by Victor D. Wakley of 12165 Golden Bluff Ct.  Indianapolis,  Indiana  46236.  Please Cease and Desist operating as Hearthstonme Mortgage IMEDIATELY!!
